Token.Abstract: Protocol to receive events related to file transfer.
Called upon receiving a request to accept a File from remote Peer.

Parameter.Name: connection
Parameter.Abstract: The underlying connection object.

Parameter.Name: fileName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the file in request.

Parameter.Name: isPublic
Parameter.Abstract: accessibility of file.

Parameter.Name: remotePeerId
Parameter.Abstract: The unique id of the peer.

Token.Abstract: Called upon receiving a response to our request to send a File to remote Peer.

Parameter.Name: connection
Parameter.Abstract: The underlying connection object.

Parameter.Name: wasAccepted
Parameter.Abstract: Flag to specify whether the request was accepted.

Parameter.Name: fileName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the file in request.

Parameter.Name: remotePeerId
Parameter.Abstract: The unique id of the peer.

Token.Abstract: Called when receive signal that File transfer was stopped before completing.
Token.Declaration: - (void)connection:(nonnull SKYLINKConnection *)connection didDropFileTransfer:(null_unspecified NSString *)fileName message:(null_unspecified NSString *)message isExplicit:(BOOL)isExplicit remotePeerId:(null_unspecified NSString *)remotePeerId

Parameter.Name: connection
Parameter.Abstract: The underlying connection object.

Parameter.Name: fileName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the file in request.

Parameter.Name: message
Parameter.Abstract: The message specifying reason for the file transfer drop.

Parameter.Name: isExplicit
Parameter.Abstract: Flag to specify whether the transfer was halted explicity by the sender.

Parameter.Name: remotePeerId
Parameter.Abstract: The unique id of the peer.

Token.Abstract: Called upon every file transfer progress update.

Parameter.Name: connection
Parameter.Abstract: The underlying connection object.

Parameter.Name: percentage
Parameter.Abstract: The perccentage representing the progress of the transfer (CGFloat from 0 to 1).

Parameter.Name: fileName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the file in transmission.

Parameter.Name: remotePeerId
Parameter.Abstract: The unique id of the peer thie file is sent to or received from.

Token.Abstract: Called upon every file transfer progress update.

Parameter.Name: connection
Parameter.Abstract: The underlying connection object.

Parameter.Name: percentage
Parameter.Abstract: The perccentage representing the progress of the transfer (CGFloat from 0 to 1).

Parameter.Name: fileName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the file in transmission.

Parameter.Name: remotePeerId
Parameter.Abstract: The unique id of the peer thie file is sent to or received from.

Token.Abstract: Called upon receiving signal that our sending of a File to remote Peer is complete.

Parameter.Name: connection
Parameter.Abstract: The underlying connection object.

Parameter.Name: fileName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the file in request.

Parameter.Name: remotePeerId
Parameter.Abstract: The unique id of the peer.

Token.Abstract: Called upon receiving signal that our receipt of a File from remote Peer is complete
Token.Declaration: - (void)connection:(nonnull SKYLINKConnection *)connection didCompleteFileTransferReceiving:(null_unspecified NSString *)fileName fileData:(null_unspecified NSData *)fileData fileSavePath:(null_unspecified NSString *)fileSavePath remotePeerId:(null_unspecified NSString *)remotePeerId

Parameter.Name: connection
Parameter.Abstract: The underlying connection object

Parameter.Name: fileName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the file in request

Parameter.Name: fileData
Parameter.Abstract: The data of the received file

Parameter.Name: fileSavePath
Parameter.Abstract: The path where the file is saved, it is in the sandbox /tmp folder

Parameter.Name: remotePeerId
Parameter.Abstract: The unique id of the peer
